snippet: In the race to attract cybersecurity experts to protect the government's computer networks, the Department of Homeland Security has a handicap money can't fix....

headline.print_headline: Homeland Security Struggles to Tempt, Retain Cyber Talent
headline.main: Homeland Security Struggles to Tempt, Retain Cyber Talent

lead_paragraph: In the race to attract cybersecurity experts to protect the government's computer networks, the Department of Homeland Security has a handicap money can't fix.
